resources.string: You will soon pass through the security checking area. This is a very important process that everyone has to do, and it\'s for the safety of all air travelers.
Again, it will be important to check that you have none of the prohibited items for air travel.
When you\'ll arrive at the security check area, you\'ll be asked to place any hand luggage or bags you\'ll be taking into the plane into a special tray.
You\'ll be also asked to place any loose items like phones, electronic devices, keys, coins and any other metallic items into this tray.

The tray will then pass through a x-ray machine that can see inside your bag or other items. You will then be asked to pass through a metal detector machine to check that you haven\'t forgotten to place any metallic objects in the tray.
If you have followed the instructions everything will be alright! Have a good flight.
Here is a map with the shops you can find around us.
Here is the list of the flights that will soon take off.
Here is the list of the flights that will soon land here.
The bus station is located directly under the departures and arrivals halls, at level 0. Here is a map to help you find it. I\'ve also displayed the informations for the next busses.
The train station is located directly under the departures and arrivals halls, at level -1. Here is a map to help you find it. I\'ve also displayed the informations for the next trains.
The taxi station is located directly under the departures and arrivals halls, at level 2. Here is a map to help you find it. I\'ve also displayed the prices to expect for common destinations.
